entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 06:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

Temperature: 7.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Rain beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
